Option (A) is a possible outcome if the screw falls off and needs to be repaired. Option (B) suggests using tape as a temporary fix, which may not be effective or safe for riding. Option (D) is unrelated to a loose screw, as getting a flat tire typically occurs due to a puncture in the tube, not a loose screw.
